title: 85/47/EEC: Commission Decision of 7 January 1985 recognizing that production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions is, because of their quality characteristics, far below demand
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 7 January 1985
recognizing that production of certain quality wines produced in specified regions is, because of their quality characteristics, far below demand
(Only the French text is authentic)
(85/47/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quality wines psr listed in the Annex meet the conditions laid down in the second subparagraph of Article 30 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 337/79 in so far as the increase in total area does not, for the quality wines psr of each individual region, exceed that indicated in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 January 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 115, 1. 5. 1984, p. 77.
ANNEX
